title: Outgoing message failure
content:
An error occurred while sending mail. The mail server responded: Request failed: Mailbox unavailable-verify address. Address is okay.

This seems to be covered in several archived cases. Solution being to change name of outgoing SMTP server. so that each account is associated with a different SMTP server. I have three yahoo accounts. One is legacy AT&T. No issue at this time Cannot send on Acct B. It has all account settings same as account A. When I attempt to change SMTP outgoing server on account B to the newly named SMTP server It chanes both accounts to new name, Sets new name as default and account B is still unable to send.

This is a new problem. Been a Tbird user since it's inception. V128.3 Windows 10 up to date
creator: calsphotos

title: Eski E-postalara Erişim Sorunu
content:
Merhaba,

Yaklaşık 5 yıldır Thunderbird kullanıyorum, ancak son zamanlarda gönderdiğim eski e-postalara erişim sağlayamıyorum.

Bu e-postaların tamamen bozulduğunu düşünüyorum. Onları düzeltmenin bir yolu var mı? Daha önce bu e-postalara tıkladığımda beyaz bir ekran çıkıyordu, ancak sistemi güncelledikten sonra 2-3 yıl öncesine ait e-postalarımı artık göremiyorum.

Bu sorunu çözmem konusunda desteğinizi rica ediyorum.
creator: ygt.sdk.mnv

title: Saving batches of images from emails in a folder
content:
Hi,

I have received a series of emails with many images placed in-line inside. I need to move them all to a folder on my desktop for further processing. There could be a few hundred images all in all. Is there a workflow I can use for this? I tried "select all" to drag and drop but I got the "no" symbol for this operation. Any other ideas? Thank you.

title: New email shows (1) but does not refresh view
content:
Sometimes when I receive a new email to my Local Folders - Saved search with all inboxes, it shows (1) and plays a sound, but if I don't click another folder and back, the email screen won't show the email

In a probably related effect, if I check the trash which has a lot of emails and start clicking through them, they appear as another email until I click and the title changes

What kind of a graphical issue is this and how do I fix it? It doesn't happen always, but often. It happens even when I restart in troubleshoot mode

title: Thunderbird Calendar date wrong by 1 day
content: In Calender the 'day' & 'week' displayed is correct ie today is Sunday 20 Octber but in 'multi-week' & 'Month' the display is incorrect ie Sunday 21 October. How can I correct this error?
creator: chriscronin47

title: Syncing URLs in contacts with (built-in) CardDAV not working correctly
content:
I have a local CardDAV server running on my NAS and several different clients syncing with it. Only Thunderbird is showing the following behaviour:

1) It doesn't like syncing URLs inside contacts (e.g. "Hompage") without the "https://". That is OK but... 2) When I add the "https://" to the URL on the server side the server is inserting a backslash to escape the colon (according to vcf specs this is correct) but Thunderbird is not removing it. I.e. https://abd.def becomes https\://abc.def which in turn is considered an error and not displayed.

As I wrote above other CardDav clients are removing the escape character correctly.

The behaviour shows on Thunderbird version 115.16.2 (Mac) as well as 128.3.2esr (Windows).
creator: h.725
